name: Waldeinsamkeit
description:
“Waldeinsamkeit” is a narrative-driven 2.5D PC game created as a third-semester project at the University of Applied Sciences Darmstadt.

The player experiences a typical day in the life of Cat and Dog who struggle with growing up, mental problems, and the expectations of others. 

The two friends confide in each other and it is the player’s task to make sure that they can meet at the end of the day.
